content: made from this pattern at your local craft fairs markets etc please credit amy drossner and link to my pattern page where available on ravelry etsy etc when selling the finished beanie online this pattern and all images are copyrighted please feel free to share the link to this pattern but you do not have permission to sell the pattern itself distribute hard copies of it or use my images or photos do not copy redistribute or claim as your own sharing the link to this pattern with your friends online and through social media is always appreciated please do not hesitate to reach out to me with questions and/or feedback regarding this pattern am� dr�ssne� the easy escapade beanie by amy drossner copyright © november 2021 7
